title: Drawing, "Four Sketches of Sloops", 1880
medium: Graphite, brush and gouache on gray-green paper.
creditline: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
description: Vertical view showing four outline sketches of sloops.  One at top is shown against hill and the other is shown with gouache on sails and starboard part of bow.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Four Sketches of Sloops", 1880.
1880. Graphite, brush and gouache on gray-green paper.. Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.. 1912-12-10.
